Package net.adamcin.oakpal.core

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ErrorListener
    A single error handler is used during an OakPAL scan.
    PackageListener
    Primary point of customization for the OakPAL framework.
    ScanListener
    Defines listener notifications for beginning and end of scan common to ErrorListener and PackageListener.
    Violation
    Report type for validations.
    ViolationReport
    Type for collected Violations from a particlular ViolationReporter.
    ViolationReporter
    Base interface for PackageListener and ErrorListener.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractViolationReporter  
    DefaultErrorListener
    Default implementation.
    DefaultPackageListener
    Default implementation of PackageListener.
    JsonUtil
    Serialize violations to/from json.
    PackageScanner
    Entry point for OakPAL Acceptance Library.
    PackageScanner.Builder
    Use the builder to construct the PackageScanner.
    ScriptPackageListener
    Whoa...
    ScriptPackageListener.ScriptViolationReporter  
    SimpleViolation
    Simple implementation of a Violation.
    SimpleViolationReport
    Simple POJO implementing a ViolationReport, used for deserialization.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Violation.Severity
    Levels of severity for violations detected during package scans.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ListenerReadOnlyException
    Common exception type for attempted repository writes by ScanListeners.
